H0.text: Thomas Hardy's famous novel is 'Far from the Madding (What?)'. Multitude

H1.text: Thomas Hardy's famous novel is 'Far from the Madding (What?)'. Throng

H2.text: Thomas Hardy's famous novel is 'Far from the Madding (What?)'. Horde

H3.text: Thomas Hardy's famous novel is 'Far from the Madding (What?)'. Croud

A4.text: Far from the Madding Crowd is the fourth published novel by English author Thomas Hardy; and his first major literary success.

A5.text: Far from the Madding Crowd was successful enough for Hardy to give up architectural work and pursue a literary career.

A6.text: Initially, he gained fame as the author of novels such as Far from the Madding Crowd (1874), The Mayor of Casterbridge (1886), Tess of the d'Urbervilles (1891) and Jude the Obscure (1895).
